GoodMeal: ^I'm called to the kitchen for my farewell meal.
^I walk in seeing everyone chatting and having a good time.
^Trissa is chatting up Jesse and John at the center table.

b: ^I see Charlotte, over in her usual chair, relaxing of all things.
^I see Charlotte assisting in the preparations of the farewell meal.
^Eduardo and Isaac are in their usual corner, giggling.
^Eduardo and Isaac are surprisingly not sitting nearby each other, but on near opposite ends of the room.

GoodMeal: ^Timothy is sitting eagerly by the side of the center table, just one seat over from where he was earlier this week.
^[Max] "We've got your throne all ready, sire."
^Timothy has been very giddy all day today. Its nice.
^[Max] "You get all cozy now. I'll grab you some food! Brb!"
GoodEnd: ^[Max] "Sorry that took so long! Timothy was just asking if i-"

c: ^I let the slip up Max made slide. obviously Timothy wants it to be a secret.

g-0: ^then Timothy comes over and more scenes with him.
^[Max] "today we say farewell to one of our more established residents,
^, who is finally ready to go back out into the real world!"
^"This toast is to you. May you find happiness and good fortune as you face the challenges ahead."
^Max raises their cup and the room follows suit. A small applause follows the toast and the murmur of conversation returns.
^A few more residents come up to say goodbye, but they're not really people I knew that well.
^Today has really tired me out. I end up leaving the cafeteria early.

BadMeal: ^I'm called to the kitchen for my farewell meal.
^I walk in seeing everyone chatting and having a good time.
^Trissa is chatting up Jesse and John at the center table.

b: ^I see Charlotte, over in her usual chair, relaxing of all things.
^I see Charlotte assisting in the preparations of the farewell meal.
^Eduardo and Isaac are in their usual corner, giggling.
^Eduardo and Isaac are surprisingly not sitting nearby each other, but on near opposite ends of the room.

BadMeal: ^[Max] "We've got your throne all ready, sire."
^They're doing a good job of disguising it, but you can tell Max is only pretending to be happy.
^I take my seat at the center table, remembering how, less than a week ago, Timothy had done the same.
BadEnd: ^[Max] "Sorry that took so long! Turns out the cook wasn't really ready yet."
^[Max] "Thanks for being so cool about... well, everything."
^"Timothy might not have had the chance to thank you today, but I know he appreciated what you did for him."
^"Ladies, gentlemen, and everyone in between, may I have your attention?"
^The cafeteria's ambient babble slowly subsides into silence. Max looks over an index card before shoving it in their pocket.
^"It's been a rough week for many of us, I know."

^"Today we said goodbye to our newest resident, Timothy Miyuri, who I have received word is safe and comfortable at Blackwell. It wasn't what we all hoped for, but I'm sure we'll see him again when he's ready."
^"But today we also say farewell to one of our more established residents,
^, who is finally ready to go back out into the real world!"
^"This toast is to both of you. May you find happiness and good fortune as you face the challenges ahead."
^Max raises their cup and the room follows suit. A small applause follows the toast and the murmur of conversation returns.
^A few more residents come up to say goodbye, but they're not really people I knew that well.
^Today has really tired me out. I end up leaving the cafeteria early.

BrokeUpBad: ^Eduardo is the first to come up.
^"With your chill, I'm sure you'll do great out there."
^Eduardo just sort of shuffles around, not sure what else to say.

c: ^, amigo. Just at the bottom today. Usually I've got Isaac to help around this time, but..."
^. I said some things I really shouldn't have and now I don't know where we even stand any more."
^"I kind of blew up at him the other day."
^"But this isn't your problem, eh? You've got the whole world waiting for you. Come back and visit, okay?."
^I decide he's probably just in his depressive state and needs some time to himself.

g-0: ^Eduardo shrugs, then turns to leave. The week didn't seem to go well for him...

StayingSad: ^Next to approach is Charlotte, who seems to have taken a break from her duties
^[Charlotte] "How are you finding your last day? Pleasant, I hope!"

c: ^To be honest, I'm not really okay after earlier. But I figure it'd be kinder to put on a good face.
^[Charlotte] "Well, that's not quite the enthusiasm I have come to expect from outgoing residents."
^"Perhaps I am simply too used to Trissa's unwavering excitement. She's leaving two weeks from now and it seems to be her favorite subject of conversation."
^Charlotte seems to be carrying on without any concern for Timothy's absence.
^] "You're kidding, right? Did you not hear about Timothy?"
^[Charlotte] "Ah, you refer to the events of earlier today involving Mr. Miyuri."
^"These things happen from time to time. The hospital is the best place for him, I'm sure."

g-0: ^[Charlotte] "I should return to my post, now. The line is starting to grow to an uncomfortable size. We'll speak later, I'm sure."
^I watch Charlotte stride gracefully toward the serving line as Max emerges with a steaming plate of food.

StayingHappy: ^Next to approach is Charlotte, who seems to have taken a break from her duties
^[Charlotte] "Congradulations of leaving your tenure at the Sunflower House,

c: ^] "So, Charlotte, what do you think of Timothy's new look?"
^[Charlotte] "hm? I believe I said earlier that it suit him much more than before."
^"Although, That is likly less to do with the change in hair color, than the change in attitude it has given him."
^"I do wonder, with you leaving, who will assist him on reapplication of the die once it grows out?"
^"he might ask me. Though I sadly know little about exotic hair care solutions. I suppose that is another thing I should look into."
^"So many things to be done before I can rejoin pleasent society..."
^"My studies continue to be fruitful. Soon I should be able to..."
^"<size=50%>No, no. I'm not quite ready yet. Another year, at least.<size=100%>"
^"These things happen from time to time. The hospital is the best place for him, I'm sure."

g-0: ^[Charlotte] "I should return to my post, now. The line is starting to grow to an uncomfortable size. We'll speak later, I'm sure."
^I watch Charlotte stride gracefully toward the serving line as Max & Timothy emerge with a steaming plate of food.

LeavingHappy: ^[Charlotte] "Congradulations of leaving your tenure at the Sunflower House,
^, I put some thought into what you said earlier."

c: ^[Charlotte] "And, I have not quite reached a conclusion just yet."
^[Charlotte] "Yes. I've even mentioned it to Trissa, at least a little, to get more external input."

g-0: ^"I wanted to bring it up, in case I reach my conclusion before you leave."
^"I feel you should know how I am doing, after having put so much concern in for me."
^"You've done great good here for people. Far more than was expected of you."
^"And you have my deepest thanks for that."
^[Charlotte] "Oh come now. Speak nothing of it. Right now is supposed to be a celabatory expereince for you. We'll speak later, I'm sure."
^Charlotte bows out of the conversation, before heading to her seat. Max & Timothy emerge just behind her, holding a steaming plate of food.
